body.name: KRIB BLING Full Automatic Washing Machine with LED Display, 17.7 lbs Portable Washer Drain Pump, 10 Programs & 8 Water Levels Selections, Ideal for RV, Camping, Apartment, Dorm, Dark Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Full Automatic Washer】 This portable washing machine is designed as a 2 in 1 compact washer. All you need to do is selecting the washing & spinning program and water level, then the mini laundry washer could work alone without your constant attention. This could save your time and you could do something more important.

【Portable and Space Saving】 This washing machine won’t take much space, thus making it an ideal choice for households with limit space, such as RV, Camping, Dorm and Apartments. You could easily store it. And you also don’t need to assemble this washer much before usage, hassle-free and easy to operate.

【Solve Your Laundry Troubles】 Our compact washer is equipped with a drain pump, which could allow you to drain from different angles. With its powerful motor, you would have a convenient drainage operation.

【Multi-functional Control Panel】There’ re 10 washing programs, 4 water level mode and 8 water level selections on the control panel of the full automatic washing machine, which is convenient. LED display could clearly show the laundry time. And the child lock also ensure the normal operation of the washing machine while protecting the safety of your family.

【Automatic Imbalance Adjustment】Other portable washer would be violent shaking and vibrating while washing or spinning. But our laundry washing machine would initiate its imbalance adjustment system to handle this kind of situation, thus ensure the safety and reduce noise.

【Large Capacity】The inner tub of this portable washer could load 17.7 lbs of clothes at one time, which is suitable for family of 3-4 members. The reference weight for all types of clothes would also be highlighted in the description and pictures.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 HONEYCOMB TUB 2 AUTO IMBALANCE ADJUSMENT 3 CHILD LOCK 4 SCHEMATIC DIAGRAM 5 2-1 PROGRAM

USAGE STEPS AND REMINDERS HOW TO USE OUR PORTABLE WASHING MACHINE Attach the water cable to your tap.Attach the water cable to the back of the washing machine, and now you could turn on the tap and plug in the washing machine.Place your clothes into this washing machine and turn on the washer. At this time you need to choose how much water you need and select the program and hit start.Add your detergent to the washer, than you could see the estimated time for your wash and it could tell you the stage it is currently at.

THE PLASTIC BRACKET UNDER THE MACHINE IS BROKEN WHEN IT IS DELIVERED, WILL THIS AFFECT MY USAGE? Dear customer, this kind of issue won't affect your usage, you could just take that off and use the machine as normal, this is just a bracket used to protect the machine. WHEN I OPEN THE PACKAGE, I FIND RUST INSIDE THE TUB, WHY WOULD THIS HAPPEN? Dear customer, the rust in the barrel may have been caused by improper transportation which led to leakage of the balancing brine in the balancing ring. If you encounter this kind of problem, please take a photo and send that to us. WHY IS THERE ERROR NOTIFICATION ON THE FUNCTION PANEL? Dear customer, there're detailed error list and solution in our detail page, you could download and see if you could solve that. If not, our technical staff will help you. IF MY PACKAGE IS MISSING, WHAT SHOULD I DO? Dear customer, first you could ask your neighbors and check the nearby surveillance if they had seen it, the package is usually delivered to another door. If you still cannot find it, please send us a message, we will help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little washer for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve waited to write this review until I really put this washer to the test. It’s been about 3 months and I’m still loving it. I switched from a twin tub washer so there’s a lot to love but I’ll give some details below.Capacity: I tried a queen size sheet set (fitted, flat and two pillowcases) and It fit fine. I can fit a queen sized light blanket in a load. It probably won’t fit a heavy blanket like a comforter. For clothes you can fit a small sized laundry basket full. About 1-2 pair jeans, 1-2 pair yoga pants and about 5 shirts and a few handfuls of socks. To do a weeks worth of clothes it takes 2-3 loads to get it done depending on if I wash jackets etc.Ease of use: This little washer is so easy to use! You select your water level, then your wash level (light, heavy etc) and hit start! The heavy load takes about an hour and the quick wash takes about half hour.Cleanliness: I have used both heavy and light wash cycles and I haven’t noticed a difference in cleanliness, smell etc. This washer gets clothes clean really well. It has a lint trap but it doesn’t really remove lint very well. If you have a dryer that’s no problem. I hang dry so I just shake the clothes well to get any lint off and so far have no problem after clothes are dry. The washer itself stays clean as well which is really nice.Connections: This comes with an adapter to hook to a sink. It has a hose for the water inlet with a quick connect fitting that will hook to the adapter. It has a built in drain hose and a drain pump to get the water out. It uses a normal wall plug in, nothing special needed there.Noise level: This washer is very quiet. I have it In the bathroom and can’t hear it outside the room unless it’s spinning and even then I have to get closer to the bathroom to hear it.Spin cycle: This won’t matter probably unless you are like me and don’t have a dryer but this washer will get clothes mostly dry so they are just damp when removing. It spins very well and there is never any soaked clothes. If your clothes come out soaked check that your washer is draining all the way. For even my heavier garments I will put a fan on them after hanging them up and they are dry in a few hours.The bad: The pump on this washer isn’t super strong, you have to have your drain only a few inches above the floor. Mine is approximately 6-8 inches off the floor and because of this the drain hose does not completely empty. So far it’s not an issue but I do laundry once a week. If it sat longer I would imagine it would smell. One way to help with this if the washer will sit is to put it on a self cleaning cycle. That will run clean water through it. If your clothes do not dry and everything seems to be functioning correctly I would check that the washer is able to drain the water after the rinse cycle. If it’s not your hose may be too high.Overall I recommend this washer for someone not looking to spend a lot and that doesn’t expect it to work like a $3000 washer. It is perfect for a couple or an apartment. If you had enough space it would even fit in an RV. I’m so happy with this product even after doing probably 50 loads of laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple,light weight and powerful
reviews.reviewText: Quick delivery, arrived 2-3days earlier than originally estimated by Amazons ETA. This washer is a life saver. Wash clothes great, spins so well clothing is practically dry, just hang drying takes no time at all. Getting ready for the dryer to match... I'll let you know my thoughts then as well! Great product reasonable price @ $130

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not much smaller than a regular machine
reviews.reviewText: Had a rough start with it. I don't recommend using it in the kitchen, unless you absolutely have to. IF you have a bathtub, I recommend using the washer in the restroom and putting the drainage hose in the tub. There is no way to get the hose to stay in the sink unless you're there holding it. I had a leak somehow the first time I used it. I couldn't figure out what was going on. I just knew that there was water leaking from somewhere at the bottom of the machine. I think it was because the drainage hose isn't very long and it was kind of stretched the first time I tried it in the kitchen. After I moved it to the bathroom there were no leaks anymore. This machine is a lot bigger than I was expecting, which is a good thing. Don't buy this thinking it's gonna fit in a small space. Don't get me wrong, it is smaller than the average washing machine, but not by much. This is the biggest mobile washing machine I have ever seen. It works well and I have no doubts about its abilities to wash full-sized loads. The only real downside to it is that there is no "rinse only" option. There are "wash only" and "spin only" but no "rinse only" which sucks. If you want to do an extra rinse, you're not able to without just running the washer again and not putting in any detergent. I added these photos, showing the wet towels on the floor because of the leak and also the Costco branded laundry detergent container so you guys can see for size comparison how big this machine is. Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't drain after 6 months. Customer service quiet
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this machine in July 23 and it was working fine until December. Then it stopped draining. I've tried troubleshooting myself and reaching out for support. Nothing, now I'm stuck with a broken machine and back to walking a mile to get laundry done

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for RV
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to go in our camper and it fits perfect. It is exactly what we were looking for. The clothes get clean and the spin cycle works so well the clothes are just slightly damp. We hang them up and they dry very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Krib Bling 17.7 lbs. Washer
reviews.reviewText: This 17.7 lbs. washer is 1.34 cubic feet.For people who are looking at this one it is 1/2 the size of a standard washerHad it for 2 months now and it works great in my small apartment. Now I don't have to lug my close to the laundry room or a laundromat.I plan on getting wheels and longer hoses for it so I can keep it in a better spot for place.I also paired it up with 2.6 cubic feet / 120-volt ktaxon dryer. To note, any small dryer and it would not be as good of a pairing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good choice
reviews.reviewText: As always, it's simple and easy to operate it takes up no place at all I bought it for my sister and she really likes it！
